metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33391 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue in HTACG HTML Tidy v5.7.28 allows attacker to execute arbitrary code via the -g option of the CleanNode() function in gdoc.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> the commit below is just one of a long list of commits that are required to remove recursion from tidy-html5.

criterions.comment: tidy-html5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
